staticherobanner.description: Our rates and plans are designed to serve your needs.
staticherobanner.title: Moving?

moving_content.header:
Moving can be stressful. That is why we make it easy to sign up for natural gas service.

Before you move into your new residence, call your local Gas Utility to establish your service. Ask your realtor, apartment manager or previous owners who is the local Gas Utility for your new address.
moving_content.sidecontent:
In Ohio, the choices are:
  • DTE Gas Company
  • Consumers Energy

Once you have your Gas Utility account number, you can sign up online with Grand Rapids Energy to lock in a fixed rate.

Natural gas consumers in the state of Michigan may choose their natural Gas Utility under the state's customer choice program.

WHAT IS ENERGY CHOICE?

Just as you shop for other products and services, you may also be able to shop for an energy supplier. With choice, energy customers from large manufacturers to residential homeowners are able to shop for energy options from a diverse group of competitive suppliers certified by the Public Utilities Commission of Ohio (PUCO). As more suppliers are offering their services in your area, you have the opportunity to choose the company that supplies the generation of your electricity and supplies your natural gas.

For information on the status of natural gas competition in Ohio, visit the Public Utilities Commission of Ohio.
moving_content.specialoffer: Yes, Grand Rapids Energy may send me information about special offers from Grand Rapids Energy and its marketing partners.
